Reviews.Title: excellent buy. excellent vendor.
Reviews.Author: oxodrol
Reviews.Content: The phone is exactly what I wanted The red and black back is unique. The battery life is hella long and the phone works with all my gadgets since google went rogue and ditched motorola.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Jackson
Reviews.Content: I love the phone! I owned one previously which was lucky for me because one thing I didn't know was that a Sim card did not come with purchase and I happened to  have one! Great phone and fast shipping!
